textBox.richText: Once upon a time the Brooklyn Bridge was the tallest structure in New York city. Those days are well and truly behind us but the allure of the bridge is still evident. The walk over the Brooklyn Bridge took us from our adopted Brooklyn home to Manhattan. It’s a pretty magical view but made all that more special with a stop at the famous Brooklyn Ice Creamery (which is conveniently situated at the foot of the Brooklyn side of the bridge) to refuel for the not so strenuous walk. The weather gods blessed us with warm weather and blue sky which provided a perfect formula for photographers delight. Of course, Andrew and Anthony were more than happy to take full advantage of this. To Mariann and Felicity’s delight (or disgust) the 2000 metre walk ended up taking close on 3 hours - but hey...we got some great pics!
